name: Wings
summary_text: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

name: Snow Day
summary_text: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

name: The Life Ahead
summary_text: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.

name: December Boys
summary_text: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.

name: The Selfish Giant
summary_text: Two thirteen year-old working-class friends in Bradford seek fortune by getting involved with a local scrap dealer and criminal.

name: Closely Watched Trains
summary_text: An apprentice train dispatcher at a village station seeks his first sexual encounter and becomes despondent when he is unable to perform.

name: My Little Eye
summary_text: Five people are offered one million dollars to spend six months together in an isolated mansion, with cameras watching their every move.

name: Handsome Devil
summary_text: Ned and Conor are forced to share a bedroom at their boarding school. The loner and the star athlete at this rugby-mad school form an unlikely friendship until it's tested by the authorities.

name: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
summary_text: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.

name: Down a Dark Hall
summary_text: A troubled teen named Kit Gordy is forced to join the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, just to find herself trapped by dark forces around its mysterious headmistress, Madame Duret.

name: Fright Night Part 2
summary_text: Charley Brewster and Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.

name: Mac and Me
summary_text: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

name: Cold Fish
summary_text: The lives of a bored suburban couple are changed forever when a seemingly nice old man gives their daughter a job at his fish store, and soon his gruesome hobbies are brought to light.

name: Little
summary_text: A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.

name: Blood Creek
summary_text: A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.

name: The Best of Enemies
summary_text: Civil rights activist Ann Atwater faces off against C.P. Ellis, Exalted Cyclops of the Ku Klux Klan, in 1971 Durham, North Carolina over the issue of school integration.

name: The Foot Fist Way
summary_text: An inept tae kwon do instructor struggles with marital troubles and an unhealthy obsession with fellow tae kwon do enthusiast Chuck "The Truck" Wallace.

name: Mr. Destiny
summary_text: Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could've been like, had he made that winning home run as a teenager.

name: Beyond the Hills
summary_text: The friendship between two young women who grew up in the same orphanage; one has found refuge at a convent in Romania and refuses to leave with her friend, who now lives in Germany.

name: Hey Ram
summary_text: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.

name: Career Opportunities
summary_text: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

name: My King
summary_text: Tony is admitted to a rehabilitation center after a serious skiing accident. Dependent of medical staff and painkillers, she takes the time to remember the tumultuous love story she lived with Georgio.

name: Johnny Gaddaar
summary_text: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

name: Kin-dza-dza!
summary_text: Two Russians push the wrong button on a strange device and end up on the telepathic planet Pluke with its strange societal norms.

name: Harlock: Space Pirate
summary_text: Mankind is dying. Only one man can do anything about it, Space Captain Harlock, but the Gaia Coalition will stop at nothing to end him.

name: Mother and Child
summary_text: A drama centered around three women: A fifty-year-old woman, the daughter she gave up for adoption thirty-five years ago, and a woman looking to adopt a child of her own.

name: The Road to Wellville
summary_text: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

name: Kabali
summary_text: Returning from prison, aged gangster Kabali confronts those who had destroyed his life. While doing so, he learns about what had happened to his family when he was gone.

name: Red Riding: The Year of Our Lord 1974
summary_text: A rookie Yorkshire journalist sets out to solve the case of a child murderer.

name: The Children Act
summary_text: As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.

name: Carnal Knowledge
summary_text: Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and befriend one another in college.

name: Goodbye Bafana
summary_text: Goodbye Bafana is the true story of a white South African racist whose life was profoundly altered by the black prisoner he guarded for twenty years. The prisoner's name was Nelson Mandela.

name: Alone
summary_text: A recently widowed traveler is kidnapped by a cold blooded killer, only to escape into the wilderness where she is forced to battle against the elements as her pursuer closes in on her.

name: El Crimen Perfecto (The Perfect Crime)
summary_text: An ambitious salesman will do anything for that big promotion he's been chasing, but inevitably, he will learn that there is no such thing as the perfect crime.

name: Tees Maar Khan
summary_text: Posing as a movie producer, a conman attempts to trick an entire village into helping him rob a treasure-laden train.

name: Days of Wine and Roses
summary_text: An alcoholic marries a young woman and systematically addicts her to booze so that they can share his "passion" together.

name: Ensemble, c'est tout
summary_text: When Camille (Audrey Tautou) falls ill, she is forced to live with Philibert and Franck (Guillaume Canet). A moving trio story.

name: One Chance
summary_text: The true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night who became a phenomenon after being chosen for -- and ultimately winning -- Britain's Got Talent (2007).

name: Mrs. Serial Killer
summary_text: When a doctor gets jailed for a string of shocking murders, his loyal wife sets out to commit a copycat crime to prove his innocence.

name: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
summary_text: A criminal mastermind uses hypnosis to rule the rackets after death.

name: Go Goa Gone
summary_text: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.

name: Apocalypse
summary_text: In the not too distant future, people struggle to survive their greatest enemy, the sun.

name: GOLD
summary_text: The journey of a man who was instrumental in making India win its first Olympic gold medal as a free nation.

name: Populaire
summary_text: 1958. Rose is a terrible secretary but a demon typist. Her handsome boss resolves to turn her into the fastest girl in the world.

name: Romance & Cigarettes
summary_text: This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

name: Kalank
summary_text: The lives of six enigmatic characters become entangled whilst in search of love, but separated by the dichotomy between the two worlds of Husnabad, a town in North India.

name: Bird
summary_text: The troubled life and career of jazz musician Charlie "Bird" Parker (Forest Whitaker).

name: Hacivat Karagöz Neden Öldürüldü?
summary_text: A story about the tragedy and the danger of humor and the humorist - A comedy as grand as the Lands of Rome...

name: Big Jake
summary_text: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

name: Extracted
summary_text: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.

name: Fritz the Cat
summary_text: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of various elements on the 1960s.

name: The Last Summer
summary_text: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.

name: The Barber of Siberia
summary_text: At the turn of the century, a young Russian cadet falls in love with an American beauty, endangering his career and even their lives.

name: God's Not Dead 2
summary_text: When a high school teacher is asked a question in class about Jesus, her response lands her in deep trouble.

name: Forget Paris
summary_text: Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.

name: Mindhorn
summary_text: A has-been actor best known for playing the title character in the 1980s detective series "Mindhorn" must work with the police when a serial killer says that he will only speak with Detective Mindhorn, whom he believes to be a real person.

name: The Exception
summary_text: A German soldier tries to determine if the Dutch resistance has planted a spy to infiltrate the home of Kaiser Wilhelm in Holland during the onset of World War II, but falls for a young Jewish Dutch woman during his investigation.

name: In the Blood
summary_text: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

name: Captain America
summary_text: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against archcriminal The Red Skull.

name: Song of the South
summary_text: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.

name: Wild Rose
summary_text: A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star.

name: Lean on Pete
summary_text: A teenager gets a summer job working for a horse trainer and befriends the fading racehorse, Lean on Pete.

name: A Good Woman
summary_text: A 1930s American socialite creates a scandal in the expatriate high society of the Amalfi Coast of Italy when she forms a secretive relationship with a wealthy American unbeknownst to his young wife.

name: Indignation
summary_text: In 1951, Marcus, a working-class Jewish student from New Jersey, attends a small Ohio college, where he struggles with sexual repression and cultural disaffection, amid the ongoing Korean War.

name: The Eyes of My Mother
summary_text: In their secluded farmhouse, a mother (a former surgeon) teaches her daughter, Francisca, anatomy, and life & death are not to be feared. One afternoon, a mysterious visitor shatters the ...                See full summary »

name: 3096 Tage
summary_text: A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the factual case of Natascha Kampusch.

name: The Two Jakes
summary_text: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

name: Lucia
summary_text: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

name: The Night Clerk
summary_text: A voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.

name: Kapicilar Krali
summary_text: A janitor/doorman and his family who came to "big city" Istanbul, with the hope to live a better life. With the different characters living in the building, the story evolves around the ...                See full summary »

name: Bombay
summary_text: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

name: Running Scared
summary_text: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

name: Sairat
summary_text: In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.

name: Geek Charming
summary_text: To win a school popularity contest, a high school diva permits a film club classmate to record her popular life, but the film starts documenting her decline instead.

name: Ninja: Shadow of a Tear
summary_text: Ninjitsu master Casey is back and out for revenge when his pregnant wife is murdered.

name: Sleepwalk with Me
summary_text: A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.

name: Billionaire Boys Club
summary_text: A group of wealthy boys in Los Angeles during the early 1980s establish a 'get-rich-quick' scam that turns deadly.

name: Montevideo, Bog te video!
summary_text: A story about Serbian football team that decides to follow a dream that takes them on a journey to the First World Football Championship in Montevideo, Uruguay in 1930. A dream that allows them to become true stars and living legends.

name: Kumiko, The Treasure Hunter
summary_text: A jaded Japanese woman discovers a hidden copy of Fargo (1996) on VHS, believing it to be a treasure map indicating the location of a large case of money.

name: It's Such a Beautiful Day
summary_text: Bill struggles to put together his shattered psyche, in this new feature film version of Don Hertzfeldt's animated short film trilogy.

name: Milk Money
summary_text: A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named, V.

name: Kill Zone
summary_text: A near retired inspector and his unit are willing to put down a crime boss at all costs while dealing with his replacement, who is getting in their way. Meanwhile, the crime boss sends his top henchmen to put an end to their dirty schemes.

name: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
summary_text: A proud strip club owner is forced to come to terms with himself as a man, when his gambling addiction gets him in hot water with the mob, who offer him only one alternative.

name: The Return
summary_text: Joanna Mills, a traveling business woman, begins having nightmares of a murder that occurred 15 years ago. Soon she is drawn to an old farmhouse, where the murder took place.

name: Clockwise
summary_text: An obsessively punctual comprehensive school headmaster sets out to give an important speech at the annual Headmasters' Conference.

name: Yamakasi
summary_text: 7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.

name: Monkey Business
summary_text: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.

name: Parada
summary_text: A homophobic, middle-aged, Serbian gangster ends up sacrificing himself to protect Gay freedom in his country. RADMILO (35) and MIRKO (30) are young and successful gay couple, and they ...                See full summary »

name: Oliver Twist
summary_text: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

name: I Love Trouble
summary_text: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

name: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
summary_text: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

name: She's Having a Baby
summary_text: Young newlyweds find out just how unprepared they are for their future together.

name: Table No. 21
summary_text: A couple is drawn into a game show with a whooping winning prize. However the game turns into more than a survival for them with no escape.

name: Cut Bank
summary_text: A young man's life is unraveled after witnessing a murder that he filmed in his rural town of Cut Bank.

name: Boxing Helena
summary_text: A surgeon becomes obsessed with the seductive woman he once was in an affair with. Refusing to accept that she has moved on, he amputates her limbs and holds her captive in his mansion.

name: Play It to the Bone
summary_text: Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.

name: Willy's Wonderland
summary_text: A quiet drifter is tricked into a janitorial job at the now condemned Willy's Wonderland. The mundane tasks suddenly become an all-out fight for survival against wave after wave of demonic animatronics. Fists fly, kicks land, titans clash -- and only one side will make it out alive.

name: Mo' Better Blues
summary_text: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic lives.

name: 2001: A Space Travesty
summary_text: Marshal Dix is to free US president from aliens on the int'l lunar base. A clone has replaced him in The White House. Can Dix prevent an alien invasion?

name: Oklahoma!
summary_text: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

name: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
summary_text: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.

name: The Thaw
summary_text: A research expedition to the Arctic discovers that a melting polar ice cap has released a deadly prehistoric parasite.

name: Saala Khadoos
summary_text: The story of a former boxer who quits boxing following a fallout with the authorities over the underlying politics but goes on to coach a fisherwoman to fulfill his dream through her.

name: Playing with Fire
summary_text: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

name: Two-Lane Blacktop
summary_text: 2 men drag-racing across the U.S., in a '55 Chevy. Dennis Wilson's the mechanic, James Taylor's the driver.

name: Babyteeth
summary_text: Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.

name: Hombre
summary_text: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.

name: Wild Orchid
summary_text: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

name: Light of My Life
summary_text: Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.

name: Intimacy
summary_text: A failed London musician meets once a week with a woman for a series of intense sexual encounters to get away from the realities of life. But when he begins inquiring about her, it puts their relationship at risk.

name: Don
summary_text: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

name: Madea Goes to Jail
summary_text: Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.

name: Shampoo
summary_text: On Election Day, 1968, a hairdresser and ladies' man is too busy cutting hair and dealing with his various girlfriends and his mistress, whose husband he meets and finds out is having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

name: Sherrybaby
summary_text: Sherry tries to integrate again into society and become a good mother.

name: Rise: Blood Hunter
summary_text: A reporter wakes up in a morgue and finds herself a member of the undead, before vowing revenge against the sect which put her there.

name: Rugrats in Paris
summary_text: While in Paris, a group of young kids try to find one of their friends a new mom while stopping his dad from marrying a conniving businesswoman who doesn't love him and hates kids.

name: The Troops of St. Tropez
summary_text: Gendarme Ludovic Cruchot is re-assigned to the French Riviera seaside resort town of Saint-Tropez where petty criminals and his own daughter give him a hard time.

name: Fury
summary_text: When a wrongly accused prisoner barely survives a lynch mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

name: Brake
summary_text: A Secret Service Agent is held captive in the trunk of a car and endures mental and physical torture as terrorists attempt to extract information for their plot against the President of the United States.

name: Steel
summary_text: A scientist for the military turns himself into a cartoon-like superhero when a version of one of his own weapons is being used against enemies.

name: One True Thing
summary_text: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

name: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
summary_text: A kid from the Midwest moves out to Hollywood in order to follow in his parents footsteps, and become a porn star.

name: The Hit List
summary_text: A disgruntled man creates a hit list with a stranger during a drunken night out and must then race to try to save those he marked for extermination as the bodies begin to pile up and all fingers point to him.

name: Double Dragon
summary_text: Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

name: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
summary_text: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organization can capture her.

name: Rapture-Palooza
summary_text: Two teens battle their way through a religious apocalypse on a mission to defeat the Antichrist.

name: Paa
summary_text: A father tries to help his son cope with a rare condition that causes the young boy to age beyond his years.

name: Edmond
summary_text: A fortune-teller's teasing rumination sends Edmond Burke lurching into New York City's hellish underworld.

name: The Other Man
summary_text: The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.

name: Battle for Terra
summary_text: A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it.

name: Towelhead
summary_text: A young Arab-American girl struggles with her sexual obsession, a bigoted Army reservist and her strict father during the Gulf War.

name: Dog Pound
summary_text: Three juvenile delinquents are sentenced to a correctional facility where they encounter gang violence, death, and harassment from staff and other inmates.

name: Yves Saint Laurent
summary_text: A look at the life of French designer Yves Saint-Laurent from the beginning of his career in 1958 when he met his lover and business partner, Pierre Bergé.

name: Fat Albert
summary_text: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.

name: Outsourced
summary_text: After his entire department is outsourced, an American novelty products salesman (Hamilton) heads to India to train his replacement.

name: The Deep
summary_text: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

name: Aruvi
summary_text: A gentle girl born and brought up amidst the ever growing eco-social-consumeristic environment finds it difficult to fit in the society. She decides to take it hard on the people. What she does is the rest of the story.

name: Hyde Park on Hudson
summary_text: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret "Daisy" Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.

name: Day of the Falcon
summary_text: Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and modern, liberal father-in-law.

name: The Golden Glove
summary_text: A serial killer strikes fear in the hearts of residents of Hamburg during the early 1970s.

name: Samurai Rebellion
summary_text: The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.

name: A Case of You
summary_text: A young writer tries to impress a girl he meets online with an embellished profile, but he finds himself in a real mess when she falls for him and he has to keep up the act.

name: One Week
summary_text: Chronicles the motorcycle trip of Ben Tyler as he rides from Toronto to Tofino, British Columbia. Ben stops at landmarks that are both iconic and idiosyncratic on his quest to find meaning in his life.

name: A Field in England
summary_text: Amid the Civil War in 17th-century England, a group of deserters flee from battle through an overgrown field. Captured by an alchemist, the men are forced to help him search to find a hidden treasure that he believes is buried in the field.

name: War of the Arrows
summary_text: A skilled Korean archer goes up against the mighty force of Manchus with the sole purpose of rescuing his kidnapped sister.

name: Gozu
summary_text: A yakuza enforcer is ordered to secretly drive his beloved colleague to be assassinated. But when the colleague unceremoniously disappears en route, the trip that follows is a twisted, surreal and horrifying experience.

name: Billy Bathgate
summary_text: In the year 1935, a teen named Billy Bathgate finds first love while becoming the protégé of fledgling gangster Dutch Schultz.

name: Waxwork
summary_text: A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

name: Life and a Day
summary_text: Somaieh, the youngest daughter of an indigent family, is getting married and fear is overwhelming each and every member of the family regarding how to overcome their difficulties after she's gone.

name: The Bad Sleep Well
summary_text: A vengeful young man marries the daughter of a corrupt industrialist in order to seek justice for his father's suicide.

name: Ball of Fire
summary_text: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mob boss lover.

name: Attraction
summary_text: An alien ship crash lands onto a Russian city, many who saw it and the occupants start to question their own existence, while there are those who demand the aliens leave Earth.

name: Remember Sunday
summary_text: A lonely waitress meets a handsome, quirky jewelry store clerk who had a brain aneurysm and thus has short-term memory loss.

name: Bheja Fry
summary_text: Ranjit, who makes fun of idiots, gets completely annoyed when he invites a tax inspector and a singer to his house.

name: Partner
summary_text: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies.

name: Bhagam Bhag
summary_text: The members of a drama troupe fall in trouble when they are framed for a murder. Things go worse when they find their actress committing suicide, which is somehow linked with the murder.

name: Tea with Mussolini
summary_text: An orphaned Italian boy is raised amongst a circle of British and American women living in Mussolini's Italy before and during World War II.

name: We Can Be Heroes
summary_text: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents- and the planet.

name: Aftershock
summary_text: In Chile, a group of travelers who are in an underground nightclub when a massive earthquake hits quickly learn that reaching the surface is just the beginning of their nightmare.

name: Srimanthudu
summary_text: Harsha, a multi-millionaire who has everything, still feels that there is something missing in his life. In an attempt to fill the void, he adopts a village to bring change in the people.

name: Remo Williams: The Adventure Begins
summary_text: An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinary unique assassin in service of the US President.

name: Forbidden Games
summary_text: A young French girl orphaned in a Nazi air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.

name: Into the Night
summary_text: After discovering that his wife is cheating on him, an insomniac aerospace engineer accidentally meets, and tries to help, a beautiful model on the run from some extremely dangerous people.

name: The Toy
summary_text: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

name: I Walked with a Zombie
summary_text: A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.

name: White Hunter Black Heart
summary_text: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

name: Code Name: The Cleaner
summary_text: An amnesiac wakes up in a hotel room next to a dead FBI agent and $250,000. Is the sexy lady in the lobby his wife? Is he a spy or a cleaner?

name: Acts of Violence
summary_text: At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the 2 guys.

name: Beyond Re-Animator
summary_text: After 13 years in prison, the mad scientist from Re-Animator (1985) gets a new chance to experiment with the arrival of a young prison doctor, who secretly hopes to learn to reanimate dead people. Good intentions turn to horror.

name: The Preacher's Wife
summary_text: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

name: Yes, God, Yes
summary_text: After an innocent AOL chat turns racy, a Catholic teenager in the early 00s discovers masturbating and struggles to suppress her new urges in the face of eternal damnation.

name: Dance of the Dead
summary_text: On the night of the big High-School Prom, the dead rise to eat the living, and the only people who can stop them are the losers who couldn't get dates to the dance.

name: Cars of the Revolution
summary_text: In the years of military coup, Turkey was unable to produce its own cars. But Pasha believed that Turkish people can produce their own cars so he ordered 2 cars. Gunduz and engineers with him must produce 2 cars in only 130 days!

name: Empire of the Wolves
summary_text: A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.

name: Beowulf
summary_text: In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.

name: Where the Buffalo Roam
summary_text: Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

name: Romeo and Juliet
summary_text: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

name: Holding the Man
summary_text: The warm, funny and achingly sad story of the 15-year-long love affair between Timothy Conigrave and the boy he fell in love with at high school, John Caleo.

name: My Night at Maud's
summary_text: The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

name: Lone Wolf McQuade
summary_text: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

name: Freaks of Nature
summary_text: In the town of Dillford, humans, vampires and zombies were all living in peace - until the alien apocalypse arrived. Now three teenagers - one human, one vampire, and one zombie - have to team up to figure out how to get rid of the visitors.

name: Against All Odds
summary_text: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

name: Ostrov
summary_text: Somewhere in Northern Russia in a small Russian Orthodox monastery lives an unusual man whose bizarre conduct confuses his fellow monks, while others who visit the island believe that the man has the power to heal, exorcise demons and foretell the future.

name: Life in a Metro
summary_text: Six different stories, about nine people, each with different issues and problems, all occurring within one place: the METRO.

name: Lay the Favorite
summary_text: Ex-private dancer Beth aspires to be a Las Vegas cocktail waitress, when she falls in with Dink, a sports gambler. Sparks fly as she proves to be something of a gambling prodigy--much to the ire of Dink's wife, Tulip.

name: Letter from an Unknown Woman
summary_text: A pianist about to flee from a duel receives a letter from a woman he cannot remember, who may hold the key to his downfall.

name: La comunidad
summary_text: The accidental discovery of a big fortune hidden in the apartment of a deceased man will fill the heart of a real estate agent with greed and dreams of a luxurious life, but the neighbours think otherwise.

name: Porky's II: The Next Day
summary_text: The naughty high schoolers of Angel Beach High now seek revenge on a group of KKK religious fanatics and corrupt politicians who want to shut down their Shakespeare production after they cast a Seminole transfer student in the lead.

name: Angrezi Medium
summary_text: When his daughter decides to further her studies in London, a hardworking Rajasthani businessman does everything in power to make her dreams come true.

name: Norwegian Wood
summary_text: Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.

name: Dead of Night
summary_text: Architect Walter Craig (Mervyn Johns) senses impending doom as his half-remembered recurring dream turns into reality. The guests at the country house encourage him to stay as they take turns telling supernatural tales.

name: Stockholm
summary_text: Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome'.

name: XX
summary_text: Four short horror films that are directed and written by women.

name: Amusement
summary_text: Three women are stalked by a killer with a grudge that extends back to the girls' childhoods.

name: Watch Out, We're Mad
summary_text: After a tied 1st place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide who of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.

name: Leave Her to Heaven
summary_text: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married. But her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both, and everyone else around them.

name: Anna and the Apocalypse
summary_text: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas - forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones. But they soon discover that no one is safe in this new world, and with civilization falling apart around them, the only people they can truly rely on are each other.

name: Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II
summary_text: Knight Godefroy has to return to our time from 1023 to get back the sacred jewels that Jacquouille has taken to the 20th century.

name: MSG: The Messenger of God
summary_text: Guru Ji is a social reformer who works to help people fight against social evils.

name: Louis C.K.: Hilarious
summary_text: In this unique and dynamic live concert experience, Louis C.K.'s exploration of life after 40 destroys politically correct images of modern life with thoughts we have all had...but would rarely admit to.

name: Modigliani
summary_text: The story of Amedeo Modigliani's bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

name: Direktøren for det hele
summary_text: An IT company hires an actor to serve as the company's president in order to help the business get sold to a cranky Icelander.

name: Resident Evil: Vendetta
summary_text: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York.

name: Charley Varrick
summary_text: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

name: Wetlands
summary_text: The adventures of an eccentric girl who has strange attitudes towards hygiene and sexuality longs for the reunion of her divorced parents.

name: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
summary_text: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

name: Critters 3
summary_text: The tiny fur ball aliens that will eat anything or anyone set their sights on a Los Angeles apartment tower.

name: Retreat
summary_text: Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.

name: Hak hap
summary_text: A survivor of a supersoldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero.

name: Malevolent
summary_text: A team of scam artists get more than they bargained for when a job at a haunted country estate gets out of hand.

name: My Mom's New Boyfriend
summary_text: Henry Durand is a young federal agent who is given a difficult assignment: spy on his mother and her boyfriend who is suspected of leading a gang of art thieves.

name: Kavkazskaya plennitsa, ili Novye priklyucheniya Shurika
summary_text: A young student Shurik comes to a remote mountainous region in search of ancient legends and traditions. Fooled by the corrupt local governor, he helps him to kidnap a beautiful young girl, but soon realizes what he's done.

name: Shock Corridor
summary_text: Bent on winning a Pulitzer Prize, a journalist commits himself to a mental institution to solve a strange and unclear murder.

name: Like a Boss
summary_text: Two friends with very different ideals start a beauty company together. One is more practical while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

name: The Miracle
summary_text: 1960s Turkey countryside. A newly assigned teacher finds out that the solitary village is missing a school. He gets fond of the village people and especially a disabled man. The teacher ...                See full summary »

name: Three O'Clock High
summary_text: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.

name: Beyond the Gates
summary_text: A Catholic Priest and an English teacher get stranded in a school in Kigali during the 1994 Rwandan genocide.

name: The Road to Guantanamo
summary_text: Part drama, part documentary, The Road to Guantánamo focuses on the Tipton Three, a trio of British Muslims who were held in Guantanamo Bay for two years until they were released without charge.

name: Astérix et les Vikings
summary_text: The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?

name: The Comebacks
summary_text: A comedy that spoofs inspirational sports movies, this movie is about an out-of-luck coach who drives a rag-tag bunch of college misfits towards the football championship.

name: Orpheus
summary_text: A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

name: Gunga Din
summary_text: In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.

name: Palm Trees in the Snow
summary_text: After the death of her father, a young Spanish woman discovers a partial letter. As she searches for the answers, she embarks on a journey that takes her back to Africa, where she unfolds the secrets of her family.

name: The Other Side of Hope
summary_text: A poker-playing restaurateur and former traveling salesman befriends a group of refugees newly arrived to Finland.

name: Machuca
summary_text: Two 12-year-old Chilean children from different social classes become friends in 1973. They both discover each other's world as political tensions in their country increase.

name: Lebanon
summary_text: During the First Lebanon War in 1982, a lone tank and a paratroopers platoon are dispatched to search a hostile town.

name: No One Killed Jessica
summary_text: A journalist, who is more of an activist teams up with the sister of a murdered model, as she gets interested in the case and wants to bring justice to her case.

name: Gentlemen Broncos
summary_text: A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.

name: Please Stand By
summary_text: A young autistic woman runs away from her caregiver in an attempt to submit her 500-page manuscript to a "Star Trek" writing competition at Paramount Pictures.

name: Rio Lobo
summary_text: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

name: Law of Desire
summary_text: A gay filmmaker becomes involved with an obsessive fan while still pining for his absent true love. Meanwhile, he shares a close but complex relationship with his trans sister, an actress.

name: Rock the Kasbah
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck music manager discovers a teenage girl with an extraordinary voice while on a music tour in Afghanistan and takes her to Kabul to compete on the popular television show, Afghan Star.

name: The Keep
summary_text: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

name: The Deep End
summary_text: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.

name: The Gospel According to St. Matthew
summary_text: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew. Pasolini shows Christ as a Marxist avant-la-lettre and therefore uses half of the text of Matthew.

name: All I See Is You
summary_text: A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves.

name: Brainstorm
summary_text: Researchers develop a system where they can jump into people's minds. But when people involved bring their personal problems into the equation, it becomes dangerous - perhaps deadly.

name: Gulabo Sitabo
summary_text: Two scheming men get caught up in a game of one upmanship, each one attracting other members to their clan and each one with an agenda of his own.

name: Beast
summary_text: A troubled woman living in an isolated community finds herself pulled between the control of her oppressive family and the allure of a secretive outsider suspected of a series of brutal murders.

name: Khane-ye doust kodjast?
summary_text: An 8 year old boy must return his friend's notebook he took by mistake, lest his friend be punished by expulsion from school.

name: Moscow on the Hudson
summary_text: A Russian saxophonist visiting New York with a circus troupe suddenly decides to defect from the USSR during a shopping trip to a department store, but he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

name: Returner
summary_text: A young woman from the future forces a local gunman to help her stop an impending alien invasion which will wipe out the human race.

name: Twin Dragons
summary_text: Identical twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic, and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood, they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.

name: Bob le Flambeur
summary_text: After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

name: Le divorce
summary_text: French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.

name: Indian
summary_text: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

name: Rooster Cogburn
summary_text: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down her father's murderers.

name: Soldier of Orange
summary_text: During World War II, Dutch students join the resistance movement against the German occupation of The Netherlands.

name: Men & Chicken
summary_text: Two outcast brothers, through getting to know their unknown family, discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.

name: First Cow
summary_text: A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.
